ygData.subject: Re: Magician Reseach
ygData.msgSnippet: ... And to you, Steven, I offer a 16th answer, based only on hearsay.  I read somewhere that the parchment needed to placed into your combining container and
ygData.messageBody:
Steven Zaharakis wrote:
>
> Ok....I keep asking around and I keep getting 15 different answers. A GM
> told me you don't need a blank parchment and quill in the container when
> you combine. Now do you need this in your inventory instead? Someone I
> asked told me you need the parchment and quill in your inventory to make
> the spell but I don't know who is right.

And to you, Steven, I offer a 16th answer, based only on hearsay. I read
somewhere that the parchment needed to placed into your combining container
and the quill had to be in your hand.

Please, do, let me know the outcome of this. I have to gain experiences
through others as I am still only a Level 9 wizard.

Regards,
Zurn of Solusek Ro
